short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display code and type coverage per line and file directly inside GitHub, from OtterWise

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
See your code coverage, type coverage and code quality directly inside GitHub.

FEATURES:
- See per-line code coverage directly inside GitHub
- See per-line type coverage directly inside GitHub

The source code for this package is fully open source, more information can be found on our website -> Documentation -> Chrome Extension.
